text:
Why did you wear your Canada Goose coat today?


Saw this guy on the train this morning. Not only was he wearing the coat, it was zipped all the way up. I just hope he doesn't die of heat exhaustion or dehydration.

How to get involved in NYC?


I wanna join some sort of philanthropic organization or group that does biweekly/monthly events in the NYC area (preferably in Manhattan). I'd really like to do something healthcare related but am not too picky as long it's something I can really get involved with. 

I am a young professional so really looking to get involved.
What's the best place in Manhattan for a hot wing challenge that will put me on the brink of death?
